title: Srimad Bhagavatam I Sri Jai Chaitanya Dasa I SB 2.2.23 I 09.11.2023
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.text: Translation and Purport by S. Jivayangres
Abhaya Charanarvinda Bhaktivedanta Swami Srila Prabhupada
The transcendentalists are concerned with the spiritual body.
As such, by the strength of their devotional service,
austerities, mystic power and transcendental knowledge,
their movements are unrestricted within and beyond the material world.
The fruity workers or the gross materialists
can never move in such an unrestricted manner.
The materialistic scientists endeavor to reach other planets
by mechanical vehicle is only a futile attempt.
One can, however, reach heavenly planets
But one can never expect to go beyond swarga or janaloka
by such mechanical or materialistic activities,
The transcendentalists, who have nothing to do
can move anywhere within or beyond the material worlds.
Within the material worlds, they move in the planetary system
of mahar, janas, tapa and satraloka.
And beyond the material worlds, they can move in the vaikuntha
Narada Muni is one of the example of such spacemen
and Durvasa Muni is one such mystics.
By the strength of devotional service, austerities,
everyone can move like Narada Muni or Durvasa Muni.
It is said that Durvasa Muni traveled through the world
and part of spiritual space within one year only.
The speed of the transcendentalists can never be attained
by the gross or subtle materialists.
